eventname: Accounting and Auditing Institute for Employee Benefit Plans
eventinfo: As we emerge from the pandemic, how is your profession responding to the changing nature of work and how are you keeping abreast of the changing environment? Attend The Accounting and Auditing Institute for Employee Benefit Plans to stay up to date on the latest in reporting and disclosure requirements and best practices in your profession. This is the premier conference for those who audit employee benefit plans.The program offers focused learning on the technical topics of greatest concern to the accounting and auditing profession. Learn best practices, interact with other professionals who face similar issues and fulfill your need for continuing professional education.
orgProfile: The International Foundation of Employee Benefit Plans is a nonprofit organization, dedicated to providing the diverse employee benefits community with objective, solution-oriented education, research and information.
orgName: International Foundation of Employee Benefit Plans

eventinfo: As we emerge from the pandemic with remote or dispersed workforces and changing participant needs, the challenge of communicating the value of benefits has become more complex but never more important. Join us for the Benefit Communication and Technology Institute and get the tools you need to evaluate your current communication strategies, learn best practices and uncover emerging trends that will help you better connect with your plan participants.
orgProfile: The International Foundation of Employee Benefit Plans is a nonprofit organization, dedicated to providing the diverse employee benefits community with objective, solution-oriented education, research and information.
orgName: International Foundation of Employee Benefit Plans

eventinfo: Come and experience a conference like no other. Be surrounded by industry experts, network with your peers and learn about the latest in the industry so you can make the most informed decisions on behalf of your funds. The U.S. Annual Employee Benefits Conference is your go-to source for accurate, objective and timely education. With the uncertain year ahead, be sure you commit to your education. Join us for the 68th Annual Employee Benefits Conference October 23-26, 2022 in Las Vegas, Nevada.
orgProfile: The International Foundation of Employee Benefit Plans is a nonprofit organization, dedicated to providing the diverse employee benefits community with objective, solution-oriented education, research and information.
orgName: International Foundation of Employee Benefit Plans

eventinfo: Join us in person at the 55th Annual Canadian Employee Benefits Conference in New Orleans, Louisiana to gain the latest tools, ideas and strategies for making effective decisions on behalf of your plan members. Hear from experts in the industry, network with benefits professionals and share strategies on managing the funds you serve in this ever-changing world. The International Foundation is committed to helping you meet any upcoming challenges, providing a source for unbiased, impartial information on the key issues you face while supporting your pension and benefit funds.
